text:
Remove the width and height attributes on the outermost SVG element if the size
of the document is not specified (instead of writing Integer.MAX_VALUE).

SVG has already its default width and height which is 100%. A default value that
works better with all other batik modules such as transcoders and viewer.
creator: tkormann@apache.org
vincent.hardy@sun.com
text:
Now, the svgCanvasSize can be null on SVGGraphics2D which is equivalent to 
setting them to 100%, 100%, which is the width/height attributes default on the
<svg> element.
